A

AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler<ActualAppendable extends Appendable,Result> - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text
A AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler is a JsonHandler that appends the handled JSON document as a text, that mimics the Object.toString() behavior of Javas collection classes, to a given Appendable.
AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler(ActualAppendable) - Constructor for class net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text.AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler
Creates a new AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler.
AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler<ActualAppendable extends Appendable,Result> - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text
A AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler is a JsonHandler that appends the handled JSON document as a pretty JSON text to a given Appendable.
AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler(ActualAppendable, Indentation) - Constructor for class net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text.AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler
Creates a new AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler.

An AbstractIndentation is an Indentation that repeats a given indentation string.

AppendingJavaTextJsonHandler - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text
A AppendingJavaTextJsonHandler is a AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler that appends the handled JSON document as a text, that mimics the Object.toString() behavior of Javas collection classes, and calculates no result.
AppendingJavaTextJsonHandler(Appendable) - Constructor for class net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text.AppendingJavaTextJsonHandler
Creates a new AppendingJavaTextJsonHandler.
AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text
A AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler is a AbstractAppendingJsonTextJsonHandler that appends the handled JSON document as a pretty JSON text to a given Appendable and calculates no result.
AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler(Appendable) - Constructor for class net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text.AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler
Creates a new AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler using the Indentation.DEFAULT Indentation.

Creates a new AppendingJsonTextJsonHandler.
appendTo(Appendable, int) - Method in class net.markenwerk.utils.text.indentation.AbstractIndentation
 
appendTo(Appendable, int, boolean) - Method in class net.markenwerk.utils.text.indentation.AbstractIndentation
 
appendTo(Appendable, int) - Method in interface net.markenwerk.utils.text.indentation.Indentation
Appends the string that needs to be appended at the beginning of a line, with the result that the the line is indented by the given level, to the given Appendable
appendTo(Appendable, int, boolean) - Method in interface net.markenwerk.utils.text.indentation.Indentation
Appends the string that needs to be appended at the beginning of a line, with the result that the the line is indented by the given level or the string that needs to be appended at the end of a line, with the result that the next line is indented by the given level, including the necessary line break characters, to the given Appendable.

J

JavaTextJsonHandler - Class in net.markenwerk.utils.json.common.handler.text
A JavaTextJsonHandler is a AbstractAppendingJavaTextJsonHandler that calculates a text, that mimics the Object.toString() behavior of Javas collection classes, for the handled JSON document as a result.

JsonHandler<Result> - Interface in net.markenwerk.utils.json.handler
A JsonHandler provides a collection of callback methods that can be called to describe a JSON document and calculates a result for the described JSON document.
